alert.note: Alert for Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Montgomery; Owsley; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 2:07PM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Kentucky. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lowest wind chills will occur Saturday night into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Montgomery; Owsley; Powell
